title: Register as a waste carrier, broker or dealer
description: Businesses need to register as waste carriers if they transport waste regularly.

department.title: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

transaction.title: Register as a waste carrier, broker or dealer (England and Wales)

description-extra: Businesses also need to register if carrying some types of waste as a one off. In addition, businesses need to register if they buy, sell or dispose of waste â€“ or arrange for someone else to do so.

modules.title: Total registrations
modules.description: Total registrations by waste carriers, brokers and dealers
info: Total number of registrations completed since the service began in 16 December 2013.

modules.title: Live service usage
info: Shows the estimated number of users currently accessing the service on GOV.UK.

modules.title: Service availability
info: Page load time measures the time taken for a sample page within the service to load.
Uptime measures the percentage of time that the service was observed to be available.
